name: 13 Hours In United Polaris Business Class: The Ultimate Test
description:
Welcome to the world of Polaris – United Airlines’ take on Business Class.

The question: is it any good?  Well, there’s no better way to find out than to take a super long haul flight – from Australia all the way across the Pacific to the USA. 

Join me as I spend 13 hours onboard a United 787 and enjoy all the travel comforts that Polaris has to offer. 

This United Airlines Flight Review did not get off to the best start. A couple of delays saw us take off over 2 hours late. But that’s life. 

Once in the air I got to take full advantage of the United Polaris seat and the uniquely branded Polaris business class product. 

From the meals to the crew, the amenities kit to the PJs this United business class flight review covers the entire experience. 

Join me, let’s fly to LA. 

#United #Polaris #flightreview
